fixes.name: Date Color
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustomDate = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR StartDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('Start Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDateParam = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustomDate,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day],
        1,
        IF(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude],
            2,
            BLANK()
        )
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = StartDateParam,
        1,
        IF(
            'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDateParam,
            2,
            0
        )
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted nested Tableau IF blocks to DAX using VARs for parameter SELECTEDVALUE replacements and nested IFs. Replaced [Parameters].[Use Custom Date], [Parameters].[Start Date], and [Parameters].[End Date] with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]), SELECTEDVALUE('Start Date'[Display As]), and SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]) respectively. All column and calculated field references were transformed to the 'Table'[Column] format using the provided table name.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
